item.title: Typewolf
item.dc:creator: cms
item.description: Typewolf (https://www.typewolf.com)/ is an online web typography resource and newsletter (https://www.typewolf.com/newsletter) created by Jeremiah Shoaf (https://www.jeremiahshoaf.com/) for all things related to typography on the web from a designer’s perspective. Typewolf is an independent site/online resource that showcases typefaces from several different type foundries and sources.
item.content:encoded: Typewolf (https://www.typewolf.com/) is an online web typography resource and newsletter (https://www.typewolf.com/newsletter) created by Jeremiah Shoaf (https://www.jeremiahshoaf.com/) for all things related to typography on the web from a designer’s perspective. Typewolf is an independent site/online resource that showcases typefaces from several different type foundries and sources.

item.title: Creative Bloq
item.dc:creator: cms
item.description: Daily inspiration for creative people. Fresh thinking, expert tips and tutorials to supercharge your creative muscles.
item.content:encoded: Daily inspiration for creative people. Fresh thinking, expert tips and tutorials to supercharge your creative muscles.

item.title: I Love Typography
item.dc:creator: cms
item.description: I love Typography (ILT) is a blog site by John Boardley based on his passion for typography, type design, lettering, and for the pages, words, and letters born of those disciplines. The site aims to make the subject more accessible and to bring the study of typography to the masses
item.content:encoded: I love Typography (ILT) is a blog site by John Boardley based on his passion for typography, type design, lettering, and for the pages, words, and letters born of those disciplines. The site aims to make the subject more accessible and to bring the study of typography to the masses

item.title: Web Designer Depot
item.dc:creator: cms
item.description: Web Designer Depot (https://www.webdesignerdepot.com)/ is a resource hub that offers web design news, views, techniques, and resources. Posted daily, resources include blog posts, interviews, and free downloads.
item.content:encoded: Web Designer Depot (https://www.webdesignerdepot.com/) is a resource hub that offers web design news, views, techniques, and resources. Posted daily, resources include blog posts, interviews, and free downloads.

item.title: A List Apart
item.dc:creator: cms
item.description:
A List Apart (https://alistapart.com)/ explores the design, development, and meaning of web content, with a focus on web standards and best practices. Jeffrey Zeldman is the founder, publisher, and executive creative director. Contributors include Eric Meyer, Jason Santa Maria, Rachel Andrew, and Ethan Marcotte with authors such as Dan Cederholm, Andrew Clarke, Chris Coyier, Brad …

A List Apart Read More »
item.content:encoded: A List Apart (https://alistapart.com/) explores the design, development, and meaning of web content, with a focus on web standards and best practices. Jeffrey Zeldman is the founder, publisher, and executive creative director. Contributors include Eric Meyer, Jason Santa Maria, Rachel Andrew, and Ethan Marcotte with authors such as Dan Cederholm, Andrew Clarke, Chris Coyier, Brad Frost, and Molly Holzschlag, amongst many others.

item.title: Smashing Magazine
item.dc:creator: cms
item.description: Smashing Magazine is a blog, source of books, and conference host for all things web design related with a focus on front-end techniques and design patterns.
item.content:encoded: Smashing Magazine is a blog, source of books, and conference host for all things web design related with a focus on front-end techniques and design patterns.
